resources.string: This process may take a few minutes, please wait…
Please check the Instagram link again, maybe the link you use is on private mode. Please use community-shared Instagram links, sorry for the inconvenience!
This download may take a few minutes, please wait…
1️⃣ Open the Instagram app on your phone.
2️⃣ Select any post you want to download(post must be public)
3️⃣ Click the MENU icon (3 vertical dots) in the bottom right.
5️⃣ Back to InDownloader, the application will automatically check the path.
6️⃣ Wait for our server to do the work and then save the video to your device.
Choose to download according to your needs. Everything is completely FREE.
